name: Realms of Ages
description:
Portals have opened throughout the realm of Ummuron, and from those portals various creatures and people have emerged. Some are more hostile than others, but one thing is for sure, none of them belong.

Set out on an adventure to discover the cause of the sudden appearance of portals, and meet interesting characters on your journey.

Realms of Ages is a third-person fantasy game, with a semi open-world design that leverages considerably on a text-based dialogue system. Your choices will have an impact on the state of the realm.

For more details, screenshots, other media, see: Realms of Ages - Website
